heading: Classification of violations
text:
The commissioner shall promulgate rules classifying all violations of this code, the zoning
resolution or, with regard to existing buildings, the 1968 building code or other laws or rules enforced by the department as
immediately hazardous violations, major violations or lesser violations unless the classification of such violations is specifically
directed by this code. Such classification shall be based on the effect of the violation on life, health, safety or the public interest or
the necessity for economic disincentive.
